sentences.sentence: A vaporiser (10) is located upstream of the throttle valve (11).
sentences.translation: 汽化器(10)位于节气门(11)的上游。

sentences.sentence: The combustor is of the vaporiser type, and hence is equipped with three preheat burners.
sentences.translation: 燃烧室是汽化器的类型，因此是有三个预热刻录机。

sentences.sentence: Under light load conditions most if not all of the fuel required by the engine is supplied by the vaporiser (10).
sentences.translation: 在轻载荷情况下，发动机所需的燃料大部分或全 部都由汽化器（10）供应。
